title: Leveraging electronic health records to examine differential clinical outcomes in people with Alzheimer's Disease
details: S Venkatesh, L Wang, M Morris, M Moro, R Srivastava… - medRxiv, 2025
abstract: BACKGROUND. Alzheimer's disease (AD) carries a high societal burden inequitably distributed across demographic groups. OBJECTIVE. To examine differences in readily ascertainable clinical outcomes of AD decline among demographic groups …

title: Benchmarking large language models for biomedical natural language processing applications and recommendations
details: Q Chen, Y Hu, X Peng, Q Xie, Q Jin, A Gilson… - Nature Communications, 2025
abstract: The rapid growth of biomedical literature poses challenges for manual knowledge curation and synthesis. Biomedical Natural Language Processing (BioNLP) automates the process. While Large Language Models (LLMs) have shown promise …
